channel.title: Class path and path variable
channel.description:
I was wondering what do i put in the class path and path variables..
I've got jdk update 7
And im a bit confused with the variables can you please tell me what to put in what variable
Thanks much appreciated.
Kalvin

item.title: Class path and path variable
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

i still get this error

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

My classpath variable is

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

And path variable is

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;

If my variables are right which i think they are how come i still got the java errorr?

Please help thanks

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2009, 02:33:57 pm[/size][hr]Nvm i fixed it lol

Read full topic

item.title: Class path and path variable
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

classpath: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
path: C:\Sun\SDK\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;

Read full topic
